oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of the City Market House, circa 1937
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An interior view of vendors, shoppers and stands of the City Market House in Nashville, which opened circa March 1937. The building was designed by Henry C. Hibbs, with construction by the engineering firm Foster and Creighton. Forms part of the Henry C. Hibbs Papers 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: City Market House (Nashville, Tenn.)
